title: Smash or Pass?
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Jay Oakerson, Dan Soder)
itunes:title: Smash or Pass?
itunes:author: Jay Oakerson, Dan Soder
itunes:summary: For Mother's Day, the guys "Smash or Pass" pictures of the listener's moms!  Also, Brittany calls in with stories of working horror conventions!
